reviews.title: Works for me!
reviews.comment: Installed the May 13, 2013 version and did not have any problems.  Would like to have the ability to see what other merchants are a part of this program so that I can patronize them.
reviews.author: James G Miller

reviews.title: Cant use app
reviews.comment: I have a Galaxy 4.  No menu items so cant even register my  card.   UGH.
reviews.author: Debbie Starr

reviews.comment: I trief scanning all of my cards and had to manually enter all of them. Waste of time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horrible app
reviews.comment: You can\'t enter your name on the home page. Can\'t enter your login info. What\'s the point of having this app.
reviews.author: Harlan Toliver

reviews.title: Cant enter royalty rewards info
reviews.comment: App home screen and frozen and doesn\'t load properly so there isn\'t any fields to enter royalty card info so males the app useless... Only thing that works is the listing of other royalty reward locations
reviews.author: Berris B

reviews.title: Does not work on android tablet.
reviews.comment: I could,not enter my card number on the home page. And the log on page does not work at all. THE APP FOR MY IPHONE WORKS JUST FINE.
reviews.author: A Google User
